original_text: It will be very bad for you, you people of Moab! The enemy will destroy you people who worship Chemosh. They will take away your sons and your daughters. They will take them as prisoners to a foreign land. It will be very bad for you, you people of Moab! The enemy will destroy you people who worship Chemosh. They will take away your sons and your daughters. They will take them as prisoners to a foreign land. It will be very bad for you, you people of Moab!
korean_text: 모압이여 네게 화가 있도다 그모스의 백성이 망하였도다 네 아들들은 사로잡혀 갔고 네 딸들은 포로가 되었도다

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 매우 나쁜 일이 닥칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will take away your sons
They will take them as prisoners
